title: Dogether - A New Dog Walking Experience
subtitle: Find a mate to walk with your dog!
description: Find your perfect walking partner with AI matching. A safe and enjoyable pet walking community.

home.valueStatement:
Find Perfect Walking Partners
with AI Matching

process.title: 3 Simple Steps
process.subtitle: Get started right away without any complicated process

step1.title: Create Profile
step1.description: Enter your dog's information and set your preferred walking style

step2.title: AI Matching
step2.description: Machine learning algorithm finds the optimal walking partner for you

step3.title: Safe Meetup
step3.description: Start enjoyable walks with verified users in a safe environment

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Specialized service for dogs and guardians

aiMatching.title: AI Smart Matching
aiMatching.description: Comprehensively analyzes your dog's personality, size, and activity level to recommend the most suitable walking partner.

safety.title: Safety Guarantee System
safety.description: Guarantees safe and reliable meetings through real-name verification, rating management, and real-time location sharing.

routing.title: Optimal Route Recommendation
routing.description: Suggests optimal walking routes in real-time considering weather, traffic conditions, and dog status.

health.title: Health Monitoring
health.description: Systematically manages your dog's health by automatically tracking walk records, exercise amount, and calorie consumption.

rewards.title: Reward Program
rewards.description: Earn points based on walking activities and receive various benefits and discounts.

community.title: Community
community.description: Share information in local dog communities and participate in offline meetups.

review1.text: The matching accuracy is amazing. They only introduce dogs that perfectly match our Golden Retriever's personality, so we have enjoyable walks every time.
review1.author: Kim Min-ji

review2.text: The safety system is really well done. Even though they're people I meet for the first time, I can meet them with peace of mind thanks to ratings and verification.
review2.author: Park Seo-jun

review3.text: I didn't know there were so many dog friends in our neighborhood. Now I meet new friends every day and it's so enjoyable!
review3.author: Lee Ji-eun

review4.text: The walk record feature is really useful. I can systematically manage my baby's health condition, so I'm satisfied.
review4.author: Choi Young-su

review5.text: At first I worried what if the dogs didn't get along, but AI matching is so accurate that there's never been any problems so far.
review5.author: Jung Mi-young

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.subtitle: Special benefits are provided to beta service participants

signup.title: Sign Up - Dogether

footer.description: Create enjoyable walking time with your dog. A space to build precious memories with new friends.
